title: Beekeepers Reported Losing 42 Percent Of Honeybee Colonies Last Summer
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks to Gene Brandi, vice president of the American Beekeeping Federation, about how beekeepers and farmers are coping with the large die-off of honeybees.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
